title: Bruno Mars: The Romantic review - you’re better off listening to the songs he’s blatantly imitating
description: (Atlantic)Harking back to Oye Como Va, Move On Up and other 20th-century classics, Mars’s homages are beautifully performed but bereft of new ideas
content: It is 10 years since Bruno Mars last released a solo album. An eternity in pop music, and yet you’d struggle to describe the follow-up to the umpteen-platinum 24K Magic as eagerly awaited: not for reasons of snark, but simply because the world has ha... [4040 chars]

title: Super League is NRL’s secret weapon as 12,000 English fans head to Vegas
description: Hull KR face Leeds in Sin City on Saturday, with the supporters they bring in tow illustrating the league’s value to the global game
content: Rugby league’s greatest ride returns to Las Vegas this weekend with Super League nestled firmly in the sidecar. Two NRL fixtures kick off the Australian season while Hull KR and Leeds Rhinos open up the Allegiant Stadium action on Saturday. More than... [4616 chars]

title: Live updates: Bill Clinton testifies about relationship with Jeffrey Epstein
description: The former US president says if he knew of Epstein's crimes he would have "turned him in myself".
content:
I don't like seeing him deposed, Trump says of Clinton
We've just been hearing remarks from US President Donald Trump about Bill Clinton's deposition to the House Oversight Committee.

title: James Milner: ‘People are always going to doubt you … prove them wrong’
description: Brighton’s evergreen, yoga-mad, teetotal veteran on the secrets to his longevity after 24 seasons in English football’s top flight
content: Being teetotal, always asking questions and taking up yoga in his early 30s after a recommendation from Gareth Barry have played their part. But if one thing inspired James Milner to break the Premier League’s appearance mark then it is a trait honed... [6438 chars]

title: ‘Violent bully’ who broke partner’s neck and left her paralysed jailed for 16 years
description: Robert Easom violently assaulted Trudi Burgess, from Chorley, when she threatened to leave him
content:
A “violent and controlling bully” who broke his partner’s neck, leaving her paralysed and her life “destroyed”, has been sentenced to 16 years in prison.
